snippet: The life expectancy of East Germans has risen sharply since their state was reunified with the more prosperous West in 1990, a new study shows.
abstract: Study, conducted by Tobias Vogt of the Max Planck Institute for Demographic Research, shows life expectancy has risen in East Germany since reunification.
lead_paragraph: The life expectancy of East Germans has risen sharply since their state was reunified with the more prosperous West in 1990, a new study shows.

headline.main: Germany: Life Expectancy Has Risen in East Since Reunification, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Germany: Life Expectancy Has Risen in East Since Reunification, Study Says

keywords.value: Planck, Max, Institute for Demographic Research
keywords.name: organizations
